title: Excessive digits after decimal point in float64 variable after addition
body:
by **mail@prostobog.ru**: 
After addition of two float64 variables the sum is not correct.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
http://play.golang.org/p/zmK8XRTP3z

What is the expected output?
eg 304.53

What do you see instead?
eg 304.53000000000003

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
1.0.2
